response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the kale out of the fridge. The robot now has the kale in its inventory. The next step is to close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the kale out of the fridge
(3) Close the fridge
(4) Move to the countertop
(5) Take the saucepot from the countertop
(6) Put the kale in the saucepot
(7) Cook the kale in the saucepot using the oven
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
